description: justification for the correlation of two resources (datasets or projects)

codelist.description: the associated resource is a reference to another dataset or project
the associated resource is a citation to a master resource of the main resource
the associated resource is a part of the same structured dataset as the main resource
the associated resource is mapping and charting information from which the main resource content originates
the associated resource is part of a set of imagery that when used together provide three-dimensional images
the associated resource is a dataset or project that is part of the main resource

the associated resource is a common title for a collection of resources. NOTE Title identifies elements of a series collectively, combined with information about what volumes are available at the source cite.
the associated resource was produced via the same product specifications as the main resource
the associated resource is dependent on the main resource
the main resource is a revision of the associated resource
DEPRECATED: use product
the associated resource is a supplemental resource to the main resource
DEPRECATED: use product
DEPRECATED: use parentProject
DEPRECATED: use subProject
DEPRECATED: use parentProject
the associated resource is a product developed as deliverable of the main resource
the associated resource is a parent project of the main resource
the associated resource is sub-project or task of the main resource
the associated resource is derived from main resource
the associated resource is an alternate reference for the main resource
the associated resource is a subset of the main resource
